title: Sonia Joins the Supreme Court
description: The first Hispanic female Supreme Court Justice, Sonia Sotomayor, is an American role model. She has set new standards for what women can do and achieve in the world and is proof that hard work and belief in oneself can help a person overcome any obstacle. This informative book, filled with photos of Sotomayor, chronicles her life from childhood to her 2009 appointment to the Supreme Court.
highFrequencyWords: advisers, cases, confirm, diabetes, investigated, lawyer, majority, oath, representative
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: R-Controlled Vowels : Identify and categorize r-controlled vowel sounds
awareness: Subject and Predicate                : Identify simple and complete subjects and predicates in sentences
phonics: Synonyms                : Identify and find synonyms in a thesaurus
grammar:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
